name: BombSweeperVR
description:
Don't get stuck in your old minesweeper style games with just a basic grid. Challenge yourself on a virtual reality version set on a variety of islands in all shapes and sizes. Virtually dig the ground and locate the landmines without blowing yourself up. Each tile with a number defines how many landmines are adjacent to it. Each tile has eight possible locations.

Test your skills and be the best.

This game is in Beta release.
I'll soon be adding many more levels and soon adding a level editor to share levels amongst your friends.
